column5: I just spent some time with our web server--cuz I couldn't view our site while using IE---  They had me try via Google chrome--I could get it there  If your using Google or firefox---can you just try it and see if it comes up  It's the Ced-Art banner at top of this site  Thanks
Works good for me with Chrome
I'm on Firefox and don't see the banner.
Thanks Lew  Been a lot of effort and $$ advertising---hate to have problems now  Thanks Again
I think it refreshes with new pages Jimmer  Thanks again
I'm in IE and I see it...also in Chrome.
Firefox here and can see the ad after I refreshed the page a few times it came up.
Works in all three.
I see it now.

Thanks Guys  So the site comes up on IE when you click the banner??---I'm just getting a white screen still on IE  News is saying Microsoft is having issues with IE and security---not sure if this is it  Funny everything internet wise I'm getting---just our site and CHEZ radio in Ottawa I'm not on IE
the site and banner loads for me in all three browsers
Thanks Jedi
i run an ad blocker, so i don't see any of it
Thanks again all----I just moved into the new millennium and went with chrome and dumped IE

I found when I added add blocker my laptop ran far to slow imo.Deleted that,I see it all on firefox.Too eaches own.My youngest son thought that would of been a good idea .I don't have a $1300.00 laptop he does lol.He says it shows to him idk.I,m sure you can get it working.
good here
I'm on Chrome. I see ads but not yours.
Thanks Knuguy---think it rotates when you visit this site--like one time handlebarz lurz---next time fish Ontario---next time us  I'm pretty sure we're still up and running  Thanks again
i'm on a MAC and it works fine
Worked for me on IE. Nice work by the way.
I noticed recently that I cannot even get onto OFC using IE on my new laptop but I can access it fine using Chrome....similar problem with a few other websites too.  Any ideas????
I.E. is not site friendly on many of the boards. The ads are on a rotating basis that rotate on the opening of a page.   Art
Thanks again everyone  G Mech---I changed my browser to google chrome
